@aconneau The default Transformer consists of encoders and decoders, which is mainly used for translation. Therefore, if we want to apply on other tasks such as text classification, we need to at least remove the decoders.
Therefore, maybe calling nn.TransformerEncoder instead of nn.Transformer is what we mean.

body:
@aconneau The default Transformer consists of encoders and decoders, which is mainly used for translation. Therefore, if we want to apply on other tasks such as text classification, we need to at least remove the decoders.
Therefore, maybe calling `nn.TransformerEncoder` instead of `nn.Transformer` is what we mean.
